name: Michael Vick Presents: Hamsters Fight
description:
Michael Vick Presents: Hamsters Fight by Jacob Lites (programming), Nicolas Abreu, Peter Aquila (design), and Chris Alvarado (art)

Player 1 is keyboard. All other inputs must be from xInput devices. (Xbox controller recommended)

A Rapid Prototype Project made by a small team at FIEA in 2017. We wanted to make a game that gave players the feeling that they were constantly almost dying, while encouraging a risk vs. reward playstyle. A fun (if morbid) party game for all most ages!

(If the aspect ratio is off, try fullscreen!)

For more information, please visit www.jacoblites.com
